business.headline: Sensex, Nifty dip after hitting record highs; Tata Steel jumps 4%The Sensex settled 14.57 points lower at 84,929.25 after crossing 85,000 for the first time, while the NSE Nifty50 ended 1.35 points higher at 25,940.40 after crossing 26,000.

NPS Vatsalya: Is it the right choice for parents?Unlike other financial products aimed at short-term goals like education or marriage, NPS Vatsalya focusses solely on long-term retirement savings for the child.

Western Carriers shares list at 1% discount. Should you hold or sell? Western Carriers market listing: The company's stock opened at Rs 170 on the BSE, which is 1.16% below its issue price of Rs 172. On the NSE, the shares listed at Rs 171, down by Rs 1, or 0.6%.

Explained: Why Exxaro Tiles shares jumped over 18% todayThe company stock price rose as much as 18.4% to Rs 94.96 in early trade. At 2 pm, shares of Exxaro Tiles were trading 17.24% higher at Rs 94.25.

Northern Arc Capital shares list at 33% premium over IPO price. Hold or sell?Northern Arc Capital IPO listing: The stock opened at Rs 351 on the Bombay Stock Exchange, up 33.5% from its issue price of Rs 263. Similarly, it listed at Rs 350 on the National Stock Exchange.

Arkade Developers shares gain 37% on listing: Should you book profit or hold?Arkade Developers stock opened at Rs 175 on the Bombay Stock Exchange, a 36.72% jump from its issue price of Rs 128. On the National Stock Exchange, the shares listed at Rs 175.90, reflecting a similar premium of 37.42%.

Paytm shares jump over 3% after Emkay's rating upgrade. More upside ahead?Paytm share price: The rally comes after Emkay Global Financial Services upgraded its rating on One97 Communications from 'Reduce' to 'Add' while doubling its target price to Rs 750 per share from the previous Rs 375.

Byju's faces setback as US court upholds $1.2 billion loan default rulingThe court's decision supports an earlier ruling made by the Delaware Court of Chancery, which allowed the company's lenders, represented by Glas Trust LLC, to seize control of Byju's Alpha Inc

JSW Group to shift Rs 40,000 crore EV project from Odisha to Maharashtra: ReportJSW Group, led by Sajjan Jindal, is now eyeing Maharashtra, with Aurangabad and Nagpur emerging as the top contenders for the large-scale EV and battery project.
Manaba Finance IPO Day 2: Check latest subscription, expected listing gains The IPO of Manba Finnace is a fresh issue of 1.26 crore shares and closes for subscription on September 25, 2024.

Vodafone Idea shares fall 2% as ICICI Securities cuts target price ICICI Securities has reduced Vodafone Idea's EV/EBITDA multiple to 13 times FY27 from 14 times and lowered its target price to Rs 11 from Rs 15.

NTPC Green Energy IPO: Can It supercharge NTPC's stock growth?NTPC's performance in the last two years has largely been driven by its growing renewable energy (RE) business, which is expected to go public in the first half of FY2025.

Gold, silver price today, September 24, 2024: Precious metals record hike on MCXGold Price Today September 24, 2024: Both gold and silver are trading on the higher side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Tuesday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.

Arkade Developers shares make strong D-Street debut, lists at 37% premiumArkade Developers listing: Shares of the real estate company listed at Rs 175 on the Bombay Exchange (BSE) at a premium of 36.72% over its issue price of Rs 128.

Western Carriers makes weak D-Street debut, lists at 1% discountWestern Carriers market listing: Despite the weak listing, the IPO received strong investor interest, being oversubscribed nearly 31 times, primarily driven by non-institutional investors.

Northern Arc Capital shares list at 33% premium, misses GMP Northern Arc Capital listing: The shares opened at Rs 351, with a premium of 33.5% over the IPO price of Rs 263 per share on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).
Sensex crosses 85,000 for 1st time, Nifty hits record highAs of 10:05 AM, the S&P BSE Sensex had risen 80.74 points to 85,009.35, while the NSE Nifty50 was up 29.15 points to 25,968.20.

Sensex, Nifty slip from record highs amid rising Middle East tensionsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 107.07 points to 84,821.54 at around 9:16 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 23.50 points to trade at 25,915.55.
Sebi fines Anmol Ambani Rs 1 crore for lapses in Reliance Home Finance case Sebi also fined Krishnan Gopalakrishnan, the Chief Risk Officer of Reliance Housing Finance, Rs 15 lakh.
Only 7% of F&O traders made profit in last 3 years, says Sebi studyAccording to the Sebi study, 1.13 crore retail traders in F&O markets collectively lost Rs 1.81 lakh crore during this period.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: BJP's revenge politics: Siddaramaiah on court setback in Mysuru land 'scam' caseKarnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah called the MUDA land case a "sham" and accused the BJP of revenge politics after the High Court dismissed his plea that challenged the Governor's nod to probe him.

Odisha custodial assault case sparks Army vs police social media spatThe woman has alleged that she was sexually assaulted at an Odisha police station, while her fiancée, an Army officer, was illegally locked up in a cell by the police.

Badlapur encounter sparks blame game: 'How handcuffed accused opened fire?'The custodial death of the Badlapur sexual assault accused has set the political temperatures soaring in Maharashtra ahead of crucial Assembly elections.

Vishy's children are all grown up: Garry Kasparov praises India's Olympiad winFormer world champion Garry Kasparov heaped praise on the Indian contingent after the double gold at the Chess Olympiad. Kasparov claimed that Viswanathan Anand's 'children' had all grown up.
Earth has a new mini-moonFor years, this small asteroid has been on a gradual approach towards Earth's orbit.

What is Section 17A of anti-corruption law under which Siddaramaiah will be probedLast month, Karnataka Governor Thawarchand Gehlot granted sanction to three activists to file corruption cases against Siddaramaiah. The High Court upheld the sanction under Section 17A of PCA. What is Section 17A?

Lebanon: How Switzerland of Middle East became modern-day nightmareBefore it was known for Hezbollah rockets and devastation, Lebanon, especially its capital Beirut, was the playground of the world's most affluent tourists. This is how Lebanon, the Switzerland of the Middle East, turned into a modern-day dystopian state. But when the bomb stops, the party begins in Beirut.
Over 15,436 live organ donations in 2023, women donors surpass menAccording to data from the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, 9,784 women donated organs last year, compared to 5,651 men.

Actor Karthi apologises after Pawan Kalyan blasts him for comment on Tirupati ladduThe Tirupati laddu controversy has escalated, drawing in notable figures from both the film industry and politics. Actor Karthi's remark on this sensitive issue sparked a strong reaction from Pawan Kalyan, prompting the Paruthiveeran actor to apologise to the Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister.

UP mandates chefs, waiters to wear masks and gloves; CCTVs at all eateriesThe initiative includes an extensive inspection campaign, where police verification of every staff member — whether at a small roadside dhaba or a high-end restaurant — will become mandatory.

Atishi, an empty chair, and a loaded questionAtishi took charge as the chief minister of Delhi and sat next to an empty chair meant for Arvind Kejriwal. It is distinct from the Bharat-Ram pious act, and a clear show of sycophancy. But the bigger question -- as the CM, is Atishi supposed to be working for the people of Delhi or just one individual?

Stripped, chest stamped upon: Army officer's fiancée on Odisha custodial 'abuse'The fiancée of an Army officer, has alleged she was assaulted, stripped and flashed at the police station in Bhubaneswar, while she had gone to file a complaint.

Aishwarya Rai's viral hairstyle from Paris Fashion Week shows beauty in uniquenessAishwarya Rai Bachchan was one of the international divas present at the Paris Fashion Week on Monday, September 23. During one of her appearances at the show, she sported a different hairstyle and left everyone talking.

Tamil director claims impotency drug mixed with Palani temple prasad, arrestedMohan G made the remark in an interview on a YouTube channel while speaking about the row over animal fat being found in the ghee used to prepare Tirupati laddus.

BookMyShow files police complaint amid ticket reselling for Coldplay's India concertColdplay fans in India faced major frustration as ticket sales for the Music of the Spheres World Tour were plagued by technical issues and ticket scalping. BookMyShow has filed a police complaint and urged fans to avoid unauthorised sellers.

Anupam Kher shares his CV on LinkedIn, calls himself a struggling actorVeteran actor Anupam Kher updated his resume on LinkedIn. The CV offered a glimpse of the actor's professional journey and personal challenges.

Vinesh Phogat should have apologised, not cried conspiracy: Yogeshwar DuttSpeaking to India Today's sister channel, AajTak, Olympic medalist Yogeshwar Dutt lashed out at Vinesh Phogat for creating false narratives about her Olympic disqualification.

3 rail staffers arrested in Surat over 'sabotage' plot to get felicitatedThree railway trackmen were arrested in Gujarat's Surat district for alleged tampering with tracks and then alerting authorities over a "sabotage attempt" in order to get themselves felicitated.

Gujarat school principal kills girl for resisting rape, dumps body; arrestedThe principal said that when he tried to rape the girl, she started screaming. He put his hands on her mouth tightly to stop her screaming. However, the girl died, following which he hid her in the back of the car. He took her body and left it inside the school compound in the evening, after the classes were over.

Israeli strikes kill 492 in Lebanon, Hezbollah fires 200 rockets in retaliationLebanon attacks Israel: The ongoing Israel-Hezbollah conflict has triggered fears of an all-out war in the region since the Gaza conflict erupted on October 7 last year as several countries called for restraint.
Tata Nexon iCNG launched in India at Rs 8.99 lakhTata Nexon iCNG rivals Maruti Suzuki Brezza S-CNG.

Devotee claims tobacco in Tirupati laddu, temple authority says allegation fakeThe woman, a resident of Andhra Pradesh, claimed she found tobacco wrapped in paper inside a laddu that was given to her as prasadam at Sri Venkateswara temple.

Husband of Bengaluru woman found inside fridge suspects lover's role in murderThe estranged husband of the woman, Mahalakshmi, said that she had an illicit relationship with a man, identified as Ashraf, and that he may have been involved in the gruesome murder.

Laapataa Ladies: Celebrating women without bashing men, says writer Sneha DesaiIn an exclusive conversation with us, Laapataa Ladies writer Sneha Desai discusses what makes the film so special, and why it's the most non-preachy film about women empowerment.

sports.headline: 'Miracle kid' Rishabh Pant's return leaves Wasim Akram in awe: He is superhumanWasim Akram heaped praise on Rishabh Pant and hailed him as a 'miracle kid' for his stunning return to the field after his car accident in 2022. Pant made his Test return during the match against Bangladesh in Chennai.

Jasprit Bumrah's heartfelt response as Sanjana reveals son Angad misses himJasprit Bumrah shared a heartfelt response as his wife Sanjana Ganesan posted an Instagram story, revealing that Angad is missing his father. Bumrah is currently with the Indian team for the 2-match Test series vs Bangladesh.

Dilip also praised Virat Kohli and Yashasvi Jaiswal for their accurate catching in the first Test.

Steve Waugh meets 'fierce opponent yet loyal off-field friend' Rahul DravidSteve Waugh met Rahul Dravid in Bengaluru and shared a picture with him on his social media handle. Waugh heaped praise on Dravid for being a fierce opponent, yet a loyal and genuine friend off the field.

Amazing Chess Mom: Chess legend's shoutout after India's Olympiad double delightAt the 2024 Chess Olympiad in Hungary, chess legend Susan Polgar had the opportunity to meet and greet Nagalakshmi, the mother of Indian chess stars Praggnanandhaa and Vaishali. Manchester City's Rodri set to miss rest of season with ACL tear: ReportsManchester City have suffered a huge blow to their bid to retain the Premier League crown as midfielder Rodri is set to miss the rest of the season due to an anterior cruciate ligament tear. The Spaniard suffered the injury during the draw against Arsenal.

Spain captain David Ferrer reactsSpain captain David Ferrer has reacted to the possibility of seeing Rafael Nadal and Carlos Alcaraz teaming up during the Davis Cup quarterfinals. New teams like Punjab FC and NorthEast United have shaken up the league, making this season one of the most exciting yet.

Rafael Nadal in Spain squad for Davis Cup quarterfinals alongside Carlos AlcarazRafael Nadal will be part of the Spain squad for the Davis Cup finals alongside Carlos Alcaraz, the Royal Spanish Tennis  Federation announced on Monday, September 23. Nadal last competed in the Paris Olympics 2024.

Mohun Bagan complete Durand revenge after tense 3-2 win over NorthEast UnitedMohun Bagan Super Giants completed a dramatic 3-2 comeback against NorthEast United in an ISL thriller at Salt Lake Stadium, with Jason Cummings' late strike sealing the win after a controversial equalizer by skipper Shubhashish Bose.

Vishy Anand bumps into Gukesh after Chess OlympiadChess legend Viswanathan Anand shared a humorous moment with young grandmaster D Gukesh at Budapest airport after Gukesh's second Olympiad gold win. Anand, full of praise, sees Gukesh as a future World Championship contender.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
